content:
:wave: Are any folks planning on attending the Javy monthly meeting tomorrow?

I have an item on the agenda to discuss the new library crates added to the project to enable sharing implementations of standard JS APIs.

I can't attend, but it sounds great. Adding the Common Minimum API from WinterCG and the Fetch would be awesome. The Spin people have some APIs published, Javy has some, I have some too, and probably some other projects. It would be great to have them in Javy to be used for all of us.
